api_list.name: Race
api_list.description:
Get race detailed info by ID {id_race}. 
Runners and riders for each race.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com/race/39302"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com/race/{id_race}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Racecards
Results
Horse Stats
api_list.description: Get horses result history. You can find {id_horse} on "/race/XXX" endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com/horse-stats/233"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com/horse-stats/{id_horse}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
